entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 30%
